content: yarn thread through remaining sts and pull tight round 2 with c2 *k2 sl1 wyib k1 repeat from * to end of round make 4 pompom from both c1 and c2 attach at top repeat rnds 1 and 2 for 19 rnds or until work measures about 6 from co edge ending with round 1 weave in ends cut c2 and change to us10 rnds 1-4 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 5 knit finishing bind off with sewn bind-off method we recommend seeing purl soho s tutorial or bind off all sts knitwise all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 8/22/19 © fairmount fibers ltd 2019 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
